bookmark.description: State Next Player Turn / End game animation

task.summary: Default task
Bugfixed cookie reading, falling back on auto mechanism if cookie value are not valid.
Scale input can be cleared, in that case restore the current scale.
Added more places for progress token tooltips to go.
Don't update layout/scale if available viewport dimensions haven't changed. This resulted in stuttering / erratic scrolling before.
Fixed COINS not getting translated
Slight increase in action button font size
BgaSystemException doesn't need to be translated
Bugfix "for X coin(s)" not getting translated
Made client state descriptions translatable
Made client state descriptions translatable
Fixed various small translation bugs (substrings not being translated)
2nd attempt to fix various small translation bugs (substrings not being translated)
3rd attempt to fix various small translation bugs (substrings not being translated)
4th attempt to fix Payment plan translation bugs
5th attempt to fix Payment plan translation bugs & removed console.log & debug
Added some i18n parameter specifications
Use the correct string for brown/grey so it gets translated in the log
Removed "auto quality" detection/option after complaints of performance and load times. Now the high quality graphics are a manual option only.
brown / gray building translation
Fixed payment tester
Removed "agora" studio instance suffix
Changed back to original game_icon.png and game title
Re-enabled shields statistic for Agora, don't know why I disabled it.
Tweaked statistic names to be more consistent with base game
Only show "guarantee wonders/progress tokens" on Studio
Commented out "guarantee wonders/progress tokens" options (couldn't get the Studio only to work)
Made buildingsFromBox data private.

Merged auto layout checkbox and layout select into 1 select. Changed auto scaling checkbox into select and added mode 2 (us full width, scroll vertically). Auto scroll to keep settings div in view after changing a value. Don't scale font-size of settings div anymore.
Set Agora game option to default 0
Allow Law progress token to be chosen for the Scientific Supremacy from STATE_CHOOSE_PROGRESS_TOKEN_FROM_BOX
Fixed 8th Wonder detection to support the situation were the 8th wonder was already destroyed through Conspiracy "Sabotage".
Added fixes for Agora launch for still running 7WD games or cached images.
Added fixes for Agora launch for still running 7WD games or cached images.
Allow direct victory from STATE_CHOOSE_PROGRESS_TOKEN
Added tmdisplay for gameoption Agora
Fixed some translation issues.
Moved database update for pre-Agora launch games from constructor to upgradeTableDb
Fixed errors: This transition (placeInfluence) is impossible at this state (36) This transition (moveInfluence) is impossible at this state (36)
Fixed missing i18n specification.
Fixed only getting 2 progress tokens to choose from when constructing The Great Library in a game from before the Agora update.
Bugfix #26817: subtract victory points if a Blue/Yellow building is moved to the discard.
Removed counter scaling of Discard button's coin
Skip ConstructLastRowBuildingTrait if no cards are available (filter Senators).

Cards are revealed (=set as available in gamestate value VALUE_AVAILABLE_CARDS) at the end of the player turn (in NextPlayerTurnTrait.php) or at the start of a new age (NextAgeTrait.php) to prevent this information being available too soon during mid-turn decisions. The exception is DiscardAvailableCardTrait (Conspiracy "Turn of Events"), whose enterState and actions reveal cards as well.

Cards are revealed (=set as available in gamestate value VALUE_AVAILABLE_CARDS) at the end of the player turn (in NextPlayerTurnTrait.php) or at the start of a new age (NextAgeTrait.php) to prevent this information being available too soon during mid-turn decisions. The exception is DiscardAvailableCardTrait (Conspiracy "Turn of Events"), whose enterState and actions reveal cards as well.

In Agora (or maybe Pantheon for the future), the draftpool of Age I should be visible during the Wonder Selection. This update accomodates that, including some graphical tweakes to make the middle column content as compact and tight as possible. Update Wonder Selection round title more consistently so it gets set when refreshing in other sub states as well (conspire, placeinfluence etc).
Player loses Victory Points when a progress token (with VPs) is locked away by Conspiracy Obscurantism. Centralized losing of victory points in Item's deconstruct method.
Fixed player name being wrong when active player backs into a Military Token.
Conspiracy Sabotage: return Age card to discard, not the box.

MESSAGE.value: Re-enabled shields statistic for Agora, don't know why I disabled it.
Tweaked statistic names to be more consistent with base game
Only show "guarantee wonders/progress tokens" on Studio
Commented out "guarantee wonders/progress tokens" options (couldn't get the Studio only to work)
Made buildingsFromBox data private.

Merged auto layout checkbox and layout select into 1 select. Changed auto scaling checkbox into select and added mode 2 (us full width, scroll vertically). Auto scroll to keep settings div in view after changing a value. Don't scale font-size of settings div anymore.
Set Agora game option to default 0
Allow Law progress token to be chosen for the Scientific Supremacy from STATE_CHOOSE_PROGRESS_TOKEN_FROM_BOX
Fixed 8th Wonder detection to support the situation were the 8th wonder was already destroyed through Conspiracy "Sabotage".
Added fixes for Agora launch for still running 7WD games or cached images.
Allow direct victory from STATE_CHOOSE_PROGRESS_TOKEN
Added tmdisplay for gameoption Agora
Fixed some translation issues.
Moved database update for pre-Agora launch games from constructor to upgradeTableDb
Fixed errors: This transition (placeInfluence) is impossible at this state (36) This transition (moveInfluence) is impossible at this state (36)
Fixed missing i18n specification.
Fixed only getting 2 progress tokens to choose from when constructing The Great Library in a game from before the Agora update.
Bugfix #26817: subtract victory points if a Blue/Yellow building is moved to the discard.
Removed counter scaling of Discard button's coin
Skip ConstructLastRowBuildingTrait if no cards are available (filter Senators).

Cards are revealed (=set as available in gamestate value VALUE_AVAILABLE_CARDS) at the end of the player turn (in NextPlayerTurnTrait.php) or at the start of a new age (NextAgeTrait.php) to prevent this information being available too soon during mid-turn decisions. The exception is DiscardAvailableCardTrait (Conspiracy "Turn of Events"), whose enterState and actions reveal cards as well.

In Agora (or maybe Pantheon for the future), the draftpool of Age I should be visible during the Wonder Selection. This update accomodates that, including some graphical tweakes to make the middle column content as compact and tight as possible. Update Wonder Selection round title more consistently so it gets set when refreshing in other sub states as well (conspire, placeinfluence etc).
Player loses Victory Points when a progress token (with VPs) is locked away by Conspiracy Obscurantism. Centralized losing of victory points in Item's deconstruct method.
Fixed player name being wrong when active player backs into a Military Token.
Conspiracy Sabotage: return Age card to discard, not the box.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Conspiracy Sabotage: return Age card to discard, not the box.
